code: public void forwardIngestRequest(Action<?> action, ActionRequest request, ActionListener<?> listener) {     transportService.sendRequest(randomIngestNode(), action.name(), request, new ActionListenerResponseHandler(listener, action.getResponseReader())). }

private DiscoveryNode randomIngestNode() {     final DiscoveryNode[] nodes = ingestNodes.     if (nodes.length == 0) {         throw new IllegalStateException("There are no ingest nodes in this cluster, unable to forward request to an ingest node.").     }     return nodes[Math.floorMod(ingestNodeGenerator.incrementAndGet(), nodes.length)]. }
